00059 class StepNCException: public std::runtime_error
00060 {
00061     public:
00062         StepNCException(std::string const& msg):
00063             std::runtime_error(msg)
00064         {}
00065 };
00066 namespace Step
00067 {
00068     class Error
00069     {
00070   public:
00071         static const  int UNAUTHORIZED = 1;
00072         static const  int PARSE_ERROR  = 2; 
00073         static const  int INSUFFICENT_INFO  = 3;
00074         static const  int UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE = 4; 
00075         static const  int INTERNAL_ERROR  = 5; 
00076     static const  int INVALID_DATA  = 6 ;
00077     static const  int EMPTY_FILENAME  = 7 ;
00078     static LPCOLESTR ErrorLookup(LPCOLESTR errmsg)
00079     {
00080       if(errmsg ==  L"Illegal filename")
00081       { 
00082         return errmsg; 
00083       }
00084       return errmsg;
00085     }
00086 
00087     static std::vector<std::string> getErrorCode( int _errorCode)
00088     {
00089       std::vector<std::string> error(2);
00090       switch( _errorCode )
00091       {
00092       case UNAUTHORIZED: 
00093         error[0] = "UNAUTHORIZED";
00094         error[1] = "The request did not have sufficient permissions to perform the request.";
00095         break;
00096       case PARSE_ERROR: 
00097         error[0] = "PARSE_ERROR";
00098         error[1] = "The text or file generated a parsing error.";
00099         break;
00100       case INSUFFICENT_INFO: 
00101         error[0] = "INSUFFICENT_INFO";
00102         error[1] = "The operation requires more information than provided.";
00103         break;
00104       case UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE: 
00105         error[0] = "UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE";
00106         error[1] = "The feature or operation is not supported.";
00107         break;
00108       case EMPTY_FILENAME: 
00109         error[0] = "EMPTY_FILENAME";
00110         error[1] = "Filename empty.";
00111         break;
00112       }
00113       return error;
00114     }
00115 
00116   };
00117 
00118   /* XML Tree - containing error message
00119   XElement mtxst = Util.createErrorXST();
00120   String[] errorDescription = getErrorCode(_errorCode);
00121   XElement error =
00122   new XElement("Error",
00123   new XAttribute("errorCode", errorDescription[0]), errorDescription[1] + " " + _extra);
00124   mtxst.Add(error);
00125   return mtxst;
00126 
00127   */
00128 };
